### **Welcome**

Welcome to the 2nd **[Machine Learning and Global Health (MLGH) Network](https://mlgh.net/){target="_blank"}** in-person meeting of 2025, this time in the **[University of Southampton](https://www.southampton.ac.uk/about/faculties-schools-departments/school-of-mathematical-sciences){target="_blank"}**! Below you will find key details about the venue, how to get there, and the programme.

If you need any help or get lost, feel free to message me on Zulip (`@André Victor Ribeiro Amaral`). Alternatively, I’ve shared my phone number in the `MLGH UK Workshop` channel.

<br />

### :round_pushpin: **Venue and Information**{#venue}

The meeting will take place on **Wednesday, July 2nd**, in **Room [32/2097](https://maps.app.goo.gl/BsWLx5KAtkqT99aP7){target="_blank"}**, University of Southampton (Highfield Campus), from **10:30 AM to 4:30 PM**.

Coming from **Southampton Central Station**? You can get to Building 32 by [taking the U1A bus](https://maps.app.goo.gl/FeLCKLUVg6ErZ4rcA) (approx. 30 minutes).

<iframe src="https://maps.southampton.ac.uk/#17/50.93697/-1.39610" style="border: 0; width: 100%; height: 350px; overflow: auto;"></iframe>

From **4:30 PM**, we will take a walk through **[Southampton Common](https://maps.app.goo.gl/Be7GxF3VzKbWyJMF9){target="_blank"}** and optionally stop for a drink at [The Cowherds](https://maps.app.goo.gl/8AysjtvWbdRPGz9y7){target="_blank"} pub (at your own expense).

<br />
